original.text:
We’re in a climate crisis.

We have to leave coal and gas in the ground.

Opening new coal mines is a climate crime. https://t.co/2jtwyKmFe3
original.author: AdamBandt

rewritten:
We’re in a climate crisis.

We have to leave coastline and gasolines in the ground.

Opening new coastline mines is a climate crippler. https://t.co/2jtwyKmFe3
